dictionary.definition: referring to a power which is believed to control what happens in the future
to kneel, or nearly kneel, on one knee and then rise again in worship or as an act of respect
someone or something who often annoys others by correcting small errors and giving too much atttention to minor details
to force or convince someone to do something
to assert a statement without proof, or before proving it
something which is cheap and gaudy in appearance or quality
charming talk which often flatters the listener
existing from birth or dating at birth
someone who is constantly or habitually complaining
influence over another country, group of people, etc
a mixture of loud and usually harsh, unpleasant sounds
describing things, such as motives, objectives, reasons, or agendas, which are kept hidden in order to achieve a particular result
to brighten or freshen something up, and make improvements to it
insolently rude, not within the proper bounds of good taste or manners
a person who lives in solitude, a hermit
